**Tweet 2 (Problem)**
The problem with AI coding assistants: amnesia.

Sarah fixes a bug in September.
Mike hits the same pattern in December.
Mike's AI has no idea.

Every session starts from zero.

---

**Tweet 3 (Bug Correlation)**
Bug Pattern Correlation:

We stored 4 historical bug patterns.
Threw 3 "new" bugs at the system.

Result: 4 matches found.
Each with the fix that worked + time estimate.

"This looks like what @sarah fixed 3 months ago. Here's what worked."

**Tweet 6 (Insight)**
The insight:

Scanning is easy.
Learning is hard.
Learning requires remembering.

Every AI tool can scan your code.
None of them learn from it.
